name: Evolution of Optimistic Rollup proofs
description: L2 Rollups are a core component of the Ethereum scaling strategy, and the security landscape is actively changing. This talk compares the different optimistic rollup proving methods, how EIP-4844 data-availability affects a proof, and how the proof itself can be designed with the latest L2 tech.

speakers.name: protolambda
speakers.bio: Protocol R&D at OP Labs, previously Eth2 researcher at EF. Working on Ethereum scaling, 4844, rollup security and blockchain architecture.
